alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan County through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chadron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road and Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 75, and between mile markers 82 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
